Posts.Content: Hi I had a lumpectomy that was very swollen and garden and apparantly it can take months to return to normal ish as can be left very mishapen.I had to have a Matectomy in the end as no clear margins could be ot sadly.Hope this helps xx
Posts.Title: Breast cancer and operation

Posts.Content: I too had a lumpectomy (no lump either!) and after surgery it felt very strange numb in areas also very swollen and red looking and hard to touch.If you are worried always get it checked as sometimes seroma can build up in the cavity they have removed samples(fluid build up) and very common xx
Posts.Title: I had lumpectomy mid Dec 16 for DCIS grade 2 no lymph nodes involved...

Posts.Content: I TOTALLY agree with you Rosie !Definatel Quality over Quantity xx
